question: The 5th edition of ‘The pulses conclave 2020’ was organized in which of the following places?
explanation: The 5th edition of ‘The pulses conclave 2020’ was organized in Lonavala, Maharashtra. The aim of the conclave was the improvement of domestic production and consumption and some areas of trade. It was expected to be helped with the aim of doubling of farmer’s income by 2022.
